meanings.definition: Augmentors: a person or thing that augments or increases something
meanings.sent1: The augmentors in the story helped the main character become stronger.
meanings.sent2: The team of augmentors worked together to boost the company's sales.
meanings.sent3: The augmentors at the party made everyone laugh with their funny jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as an augmentor, spreading positivity wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The augmentors in the garden made the flowers bloom brighter than ever before.

meanings.definition: Augmentors: a group of individuals who enhance or improve a particular situation or outcome
meanings.sent1: The augmentors at the event made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The augmentors in the project group collaborated effectively to achieve success.
meanings.sent3: The augmentors in the movie made the audience cheer with their heroic actions.
meanings.sent4: Their unity acted as an augmentor, bringing harmony to the community.
meanings.sent5: The augmentors in the classroom inspired the students to reach their full potential.
